entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 6:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.2°C
Pressure: 102.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -13.8°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 30 January 2023
